page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF........
page.content: I wake up at 7.00.I get washed.I get dressed.I have for breakfast toast and cornflakes. For a drink I have orange.Then I go to school by car. School starts at 9.00.We sometimes write our news.Then it is break time.I usually play mums and dads.After break we finish what we were doing.12.00 is lunch time.After lunch it is break time.After break time it is the afternoon. We sometimes have choosing time. Then it is break-time. After break_time we have a story.At 3.30 we go home.When I go home first I wash my hands.Then I watch the television.Then I have tea.Then I get washed.Then I read and then I go to bed.
